imgDesc.text:
Your destiny with Narzissenkreuz has come to a conclusion, but power still remains within the Holy Blade.
Immersing the Sword of Narzissenkreuz in the <color=#ffe14b>font</color> brimming with magical power within the story of Annapausis can <color=#ffe14b>change</color> the sword's alignment <color=#ffe14b>between pneuma and ousia</color> .
